location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter to Carim Caun (Karim Khan) from John Beaumont at Bushire

mods.abstract: The letter complains about the delay in Carim Caun's [Karim Khan's] message reaching Bussora [Basra] due to the detainment of Bushire's Cossid (messenger) by Ally Mahomet Caun [Ali Muhammad Khan] and asks for Carim Caun to redress the many insults suffered by the company staff in Bussora.
